metadata.title: CVE-2024-35916 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:dma-buf: Fix NULL pointer dereference in sanitycheck() If due to a memoryallocation failure mock_chain() returns NULL, it is passed todma_fence_enable_sw_signaling() resulting in NULL pointer dereferencethere. Call dma_fence_enable_sw_signaling() only if mock_chain() succeeds.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
